DataElement.preferredName: Colorectal Surgical Procedure Sphincter Preserved Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no question related to sparing the ring-shaped muscle that relaxes or tightens to open or close the anal passage in a surgical procedure of the colon, rectum and anal canal.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to sparing the ring-shaped muscle that relaxes or tightens to open or close the anal passage in a surgical procedure of the colon, rectum and anal canal.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (ko-lo-REK-tul) Having to do with the colon or the rectum.:Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the colon and rectum, or to the entire large bowel.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: A ring-shaped muscle that relaxes or tightens to open or close a passage or opening in the body. Examples are the anal sphincter (around the opening of the anus) and the pyloric sphincter (at the lower opening of the stomach).:No value exists.

Concepts.definition: A circular band of muscle that functions to regulate the size of an orifice in the body.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
